Class AdaBoostClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.AbstractDistribution
      • dist.AbstractConditionalDistribution
        • func.AdaBoostClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConditionalDistribution, Distribution, FunctionApproximater, java.io.Serializable

    public class AdaBoostClassifier
extends AbstractConditionalDistribution
implements FunctionApproximater
    A class for construcing a ensemble of decision stumps
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
